name: Japanese Cocktail
description: The Japanese Cocktail, curiously made with mostly French ingredients, is like an Old Fashioned with a rich and nutty twist. This classic cocktail included in Jerry Thomas' Bar-Tender's Guide in 1862.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a mixing glass half full with ice. Add cognac, orgeat, and bitters. Stir well.
Twist lemon peel over the drink and drop in as a garnish.
